name: School
tagline: A repository for all my work at school
body:
### Welcome to my School repository
Welcome. You will find handmade java classes and interfaces, which we had to do in school. I won't comment on them, but it can be, sometimes in english, sometimes in german. If you're searching for some api's or useful java classes try my [Useful Java Classes](http://www.github.com/TnTGamesTV/Useful) repository, where you can find things like mysql or reflections.

### Copyright & Crediting
Everything I'm posting is under my copyright, if not, I'm crediting the person.

### Pull requests
For my school repository:
I won't accept pull requests, because it is school work.

For my 'useful java classes' repository:
I will, just ask.

### Authors and Contributors
This project is created by @TnTGamesTV and supported by @210812chm. Thank you :D.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
